articles.title: Trump administration argues judge can't order the return of man mistakenly deported to El Salvador
articles.description: Government lawyers say a federal judge has no control over Kilmar Abrego Garcia and no authority to arrange for his return.
articles.content:
Lawyers for man mistakenly deported want him flown back to the U.S.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump's Policies Rock US Political and Economic Landscape
articles.description: Recent US news highlights include the Senate's approval of tax cuts, Trump's stance on economic turmoil, a top State Department appointment, pending Supreme Court decisions, and widespread protests. Tariffs have sparked global trade talks, while legal and security issues within the US continue to unfold under Trump's administration.
articles.content:
The U.S. Senate, in a close 51-48 vote, approved a Republican budget that extends President Trump's 2017 tax cuts, unlocking a reconciliation process that avoids a 60-vote threshold.

articles.title: Trump tells Americans to "hang tough" as 10% universal tariffs take effect
articles.description: Countries targeted by President Trump for higher so-called reciprocal tariffs are due to go into effect on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Some of the new tariffs announced by President Trump earlier this week went into effect Saturday, triggering customs agents' collections at ports of entry across the U.S.

articles.title: Trump's Trade Tango: Markets Brace for Economic Repercussions
articles.description: President Donald Trump faces criticism over economic fallouts due to trade tariffs. Despite declining markets, Trump insists this approach is a remedy and refuses compromise unless the U.S.-China trade deficit is addressed. As tariffs take effect globally, the U.S. signals openness but awaits fair deals.
articles.content: Amid growing concerns over the economic consequences of his trade strategies, U.S. President Donald Trump remarked on Sunday that market downturns are sometimes necessary to remedy larger issues. Despite the turmoil, Trump maintains that current lead... [631 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Stock Selloff: Market Reels After Tariff Shocker
articles.description: U.S. stock futures dropped sharply as a week of volatility loomed, following the Trump administration's unexpected tariff announcement. The S&P 500 saw a massive drop, losing trillions in market value. Experts predict some gains but caution against their sustainability amidst ongoing market uncertainty.
articles.content:
The U.S. stock futures experienced a significant drop late Sunday, hinting at continued market volatility after the Trump administration's unexpected tariff announcement last week wiped out trillions in equity value.

articles.title: Trump Talks Trade and Markets: Medicine or Strategy?
articles.description: President Donald Trump addressed concerns about the market selloff, emphasizing that sometimes tough measures are necessary. articles.content:
President Donald Trump clarified remarks regarding the fluctuating markets, stating that at times, economic interventions are inevitable. His comments come as the U.S. grapples with a significant market selloff.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Markets Tumble as Tariff Tensions Escalate
articles.description: U.S. stock futures dropped significantly following the Trump administration's tariff announcement. Experts attribute the decline to investor uncertainty and fears of a deepening trade war, potential recession, and lack of intervention by the Federal Reserve. Market recovery remains uncertain amid ongoing risk aversion.
articles.content:
U.S. stock futures opened sharply lower on Sunday night, hinting at a continuation of last week's dramatic selloff. The market turmoil follows the Trump administration's tariff announcement, which has already wiped trillions from equity values.

articles.title: Artist of 'Distorted' Trump Portrait Says, His Complaint Ruined Her Business
articles.description: Sarah Boardman , who painted a bad portrait of President Trump, is complaining her business is at risk. Trump asks for portrait removal.
